_header: By this fire I warm my hands
_description: The occupations appropriate to the several months — six couplets

BodDig88.First Lines:
By thys fyre I warme my handysAnd with my spade I delfe my
                    landys…
BodDig88.Last Lines:
…At Martynes masse I kylle my swyneAnd at christes masse I
                    drynke redde wyne
BodDig88.Note: Names of the 12 months are written in the left margin.

BLAdd22720.First Lines:
By þis fyre y warme myne hondesAnd with þys spade I delfe
                    my londe…
BLAdd22720.Last Lines:
…Wyth þys ax y scle my swyneOf þis cuppis y drynk
                    boþ ale & wyne
